creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Carol Brooks
description: mountain landscape with trees: at LL, a figure with straw rain cape crosses a bridge into a grove of trees at R; mountains at center with rooftops emerging from the fog at center R; larger mountain range in background; bands of diagonal, light grey brushstrokes allude to rain
marks:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals

ULQ: [ 雨気不離山  LRQ: [ 中林成昌 ] {Nakabayashi Seishō}
title: Summer Mountains, Sudden Shower
